text: Answer: (b) and (c) Solution: (a) FALSE, Register renaming renames registers. It does not affect dependences through memory. (b) TRUE, Output dependences are name dependences and are-removed by register renaming. (c) TRUE, Anti-dependences are name dependences and are removed by register renaming. (d) FALSE, Flow dependences are true (not name) dependences and are not removed by register renaming.
